data.system_settings: Samsung Galaxy J7 Prime ~ Android 7.0 Nougat
data.short_description: Arrow that shows whether a category is expanded or not will briefly switch if you scroll to it
data.steps_to_repro: - Find a guild with a lot of channels, up to the point you can scroll - Find a category that is at the bottom - Minimize/Deflate the category - Scroll up - Scroll down quickly - Watch the arrow very closelyAlternatively - Find a category at the top - Minimize/Deflate the category - Scroll down - Scroll up - Watch the arrow very closely
